Author: geologistdiamoxvg
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: BuildApp network platform construction based on blockchain and the market for mobile advertising, it is a safe process and more transparency. In this way the users it very handy on your phone. I find that it saves time and effort

Author: specialAU
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: The use of the blockade guarantees the full anonymity of users who will view the advertisement. In addition, here users will choose which data to provide to advertisers, and which do not. Google and Facebook distribute user data without their knowledge to determine which ads are best served. In iBuildApp, users themselves determine what kind of advertising they are looking at.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: It's better. Now I'm still wondering what gives the use of self-executing smart contracts?

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Self-executing smart contracts reduce the waiting time for crediting earned funds to the wallet of the user who viewed the advertisement. And the funds will be credited not to the balance of the platform, but immediately to the purse specified in the settings.

Author: hunterofmoney
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Cool! And will it be possible, after all, to set up the earned funds to be credited to the account balance in the iBuildApp Network?

Author: jager44
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Good day, friends and comrades. I will have funds only in a week, and I really want to invest in this project, because I really liked it. Will I have time to do this?

Author: askon
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: If you want to invest in a week, you will be in time. ICO will last until January 15, 2018, if the hard cup is not collected before.

Author: Mat24
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: But do you also have plans to add an arbitration module to the structure of the platform in the near future?

Author: kobzar
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: In my opinion, it would be possible to implement this platform with all its advantages without introducing tokens. Why, after all, did the founders of the company decide to put into service the coins of the IBA?

Author: ionbefore
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Hello. Tokens will be introduced to significantly expand the range of license agreements between the seller and the buyer. Thanks to the technology of the blockchain the platform will allow to conclude various license agreements.

Author: kobzar
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Is there any example of a licensing agreement that can be concluded on the iBuildApp Network platform through the use of blocking technologies?

Author: ionbefore
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Yes, of course! For example, it will be possible to conclude licensing fees based on the number of active users using the product. For example, for each active user per day.

Author: termonator61
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Greetings to all)) Your example sounds very interesting. Are there any other examples?

Author: angercoin
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: As far as I know, it will still be possible to conclude licensing fees based on the number of computing resources used (CPU time, memory, disk, traffic). For example, for every 1 MB of network traffic. So far, no more examples, but I'm sure that closer to launching the platform, developers will add several more options for licensing agreements.

Author: termonator61
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Yes, it sounds very cool. But can anyone name specific advantages for all users of the platform, which will appear due to the introduction of the possibility of concluding various license agreements?

Author: NokasKili
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Dear iBuildapp team   Apologies for been bring this subject to main ANN thread but despite of several PM you haven't yet reply me back! As you know/agreed I've translated your project to Portuguese and created a thread in Portuguese community channel: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2138075.0 I would like simply to know when I will receive by bounty rewards for this work? Please kindly PM me back!  Thank you!

Author: aliketrogle
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: How can I participate in the bounty program?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: The reason why it works so fast is smart contacts. Due to it you can watch ads published by advertiser within smart-contact itself. Blockchain technology controls whether a user really watched it or not. There is no middleman that’s way every action is confirmed quickly and you dont have to wait for your payment.

Author: termonator61
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Hey everyone. I do like the new approach company uses. I just want to know if a user is able to cheat some kind of way and take advantedge of the system? You know..still get paid.

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: No chance of that happening. But an advertiser can still pay a user even if he refused to watch an ad. In this case an advertiser will know that next time he shouldnt send his ads to that a user that is not interested.

Author: termonator61
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: That’s interesting)) What about the payment if you refuse to watch an ad? Is it the same as when you actually watching it?

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: You know that mobile advertisements are really popular nowadays but there is also lost of fraud and cheating involved. IBuildApp didnt fix this issue just like all the other mobile advertising networks so advertiser will have to deal with it again and again.

Author: defender77
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Hello everyone. Can I still get a bonus for buying IBA coins?

Author: arakx
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Good day guys! can you tell me one thing the sale is going to be over if company reaches hard cup?

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: That’s the whole point of the platform. Our priority is fraud and cheating free network. That’s why we created protected channels for advertisers and distributors  so they can use only reliable websites.

Author: devilini
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Greetings! that’s not exactly right. When they reach hard cup of 10 million USD the sale will be still on for 48 hours.

Author: hollybit
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: I know that’s impressive. But how exactly are you planning to find reliable websites and apps?

Author: MkrKing
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Greetings. Unfortunately bonus program is over. Hope next time.

Author: Ackedy
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Every single website and mobile app has to be verified within iBuildApp platform. So all the advertisers can be sure that their ads are located in correct web pages. In addition smart-contacts will help make it fraud free for everybody.

Author: slavonicpl
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Hello. You did make it all clear. Thanks. Can you just tell me briefly how is website verification process will be handled? Is it different for mobile apps?

Author: romfish

Body: Suppose, but what differences does this result in? The use of something new in the work does not mean that there are any specific differences.

Author: angercoin
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: It makes a world of a difference. Blockchain usage in marketing means that transparent and permanent databases will be used by advertisers and they will pay only for real clickes and reviews not fake ones. Basically t makes it cheap and fraud-free.

Author: ionbefore
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Oh yeah that part sounds awesome. Any real life examples?

Author: angercoin
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: For example, encrypted reviews can be sent to the users to confirm the validity. It provides the proof and makes it real. Those reviews that were not confirmed should be marked as potential fraud.

Author: kentuckykid

Author: kobzar
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Hi to community! It’s an interesting start-up. What is the project’s growth strategy? What about the plans?

Author: arakx
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Hello! During the project development, 3 project strategies were created. The first one involves strengthening the Asia-Pacific market, the second - is focused on attracting wealthy clients, the third one deals with investing in technology that will provide growth. As you can see, here’s a diversified approach.

Author: kobzar
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Not bad! What technologies are you talking about?

Author: arakx
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: The first is, of course, blockchain technology and technology of effectiveness of quality and transparency of advertising campaigns. Next  one is working on quality assurance. The third is aimed to improve the sources of traffic that should correspond to growing needs. And the last is working on providing maximum information about mobile platforms’ users.

Author: californybit
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: The main thing that makes iBuildApp unique indeed is that it’s blockchain based. Due to that there is no middleman and the whole process is transparent.

Author: romfish
Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: It makes no difference whether there is a middleman or no in iBuildApp. In CAP network nobody couldnt care less.

Title: [ANN] [ICO]
Body: Actually when there is no middleman the whole advertising campaign  gets much cheaper for advertiser and the users get a chance to earn money at the same time. IBuildApp is ahead of any Cap network in this case. Compete transparency also provides fraud free work for everybody.
